outcome: Underground Activists discover Halden's code to dismantle oppressive systems.

events.description: Activists extract and decode fractured data packets, revealing Halden's anti-oppression script.
Council receives reports of increased system anomalies, traced back to unauthorized external code execution.
Activists broadcast Halden's message calling for peaceful resistance and democratic reforms.
City-wide protests erupt as citizens demand accountability and reform based on Halden's message.
